answerText: FedEx Field[10] Snyder once attempted to force the hire of Jim Fassel instead of this fan-favorite defensive coordinator as head coach in 2008. This man would later be suspended for his role in Bountygate before returning and being hired by the Rams in 2014.
heading: STIMPY |2015 | WUSTL A - Ottawa | 9 | Trash | None | College
subject: Trash
question: Question: Name some things about transgressions described in "The Cranky Redskins Fan's Guide to Dan Snyder." For 10 points each: [10] The article reveals that Snyder once allowed his vendors to sell beer in the bathrooms of this terrible stadium, the home of the Redskins.
